name: Fear of parenting
author: Michel Moreau
post:
I'll be an amazingly loving father, but I fear my parenting days because of housekeeping.

Vacuuming, doing the dishes, doing the laundry, folding, cooking, cutting grass, bathroom cleaning, preparing lunches, making the bed, keeping things tidy, etc.

I'm one of the worst at almost all of the above.

Hopefully, Marie Kondo will save me by then.

Fingers crossed.
